column3: As  discussed  above,  material  facts  contained  in  the  affidavit  filed  by  the

column1: Applicant are disputed  on  identification of the  land and the applicant acting  in  bad

column2: faith.  In such circumstances, the affirrnant  has  purported to  be the applicant to  file
instant  revision  application,  wherein  the  Petitioner  has  broken
acting  in  utmost  good  faith.  Therefore,  the  affidavit  tendered  in  support  of this
application cannot be admitted as a valid affidavit and should be rejected.
